001.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. This particular course will be offered online asynchronously with opportunities each week to engage with the Instructor, Teaching Assistants and students through synchronous/video interaction.

002.comments: This is a blended learning course where 50% of the course takes place in-class and 50% online.

description: An exploration of the writing of fiction, focusing on how a writer employs the technical elements of the craft of fiction. Manuscript submission not required for admission.
